title: Multiple languages in Google Assistant
content:
Hello.
When setting up multiple languages for Assistant I've noticed  below notification:
"latest variant of Assistant isn't available on this device in the languages you've selected"

which is I believe confusing since both Swedish and English are supported. 
I can use "Ok Google" and speaking to my Pixel in both languages works but why this notification? See also screenshot attached.

Do I need to do anything to get the "latest" version for Google Assistant? I thought Google Assistant is part of Android system (I run Android 10) not an app and anyway all updates are done.

BR
Adrian
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
